com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.theme

Interface AppTheme<T extends AppTheme>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AppWidgetTheme<T>

    public interface AppTheme<T extends AppTheme>
    Interface to implement an app theme.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T autoGenerateColors()
      Auto generate tint or inverse colors according to the base colors.

      • setThemeRes

        T setThemeRes(int themeRes)
        Set the theme resource used by this theme.
        Parameters:
        themeRes - The theme resource to be set.
        Returns:
        The T object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.

      • getBackgroundColor

        int getBackgroundColor(boolean resolve)
        Returns the background color used by this theme.
        Parameters:
        resolve - true to resolve the auto color.
        Returns:
        The background color used by this theme.

        int getBackgroundColor()
        Returns the background color used by this theme.
        Returns:
        The background color used by this theme.

      • setBackgroundColor

        T setBackgroundColor(int backgroundColor,
                     boolean generateTint)
        Set the background color used by this theme.
        Parameters:
        backgroundColor - The background color to be set.
        generateTint - true to automatically generate the tint color also.
        Returns:
        The T object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.
        See Also:
        setTintBackgroundColor(int)

      • setBackgroundColor

        T setBackgroundColor(int backgroundColor)
        Set the background color used by this theme.

        It will automatically generate the tint color also.

        Parameters:
        backgroundColor - The background color to be set.
        Returns:
        The T object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.

      • isDarkTheme

        boolean isDarkTheme()
        Returns true if this theme is dark.
        Returns:
        true if this theme is dark.

      • autoGenerateColors

        T autoGenerateColors(boolean tint,
                     boolean inverse)
        Auto generate tint or inverse colors according to the base colors. They can be set individually by calling the appropriate methods.
        Parameters:
        tint - true to generate tint colors.
        inverse - true to generate inverse colors.
        Returns:
        The T object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.

      • autoGenerateColors

        T autoGenerateColors()
        Auto generate tint or inverse colors according to the base colors. They can be set individually by calling the appropriate methods.
        Returns:
        The T object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.
        See Also:
        autoGenerateColors(boolean, boolean)

      • toJsonString

        String toJsonString()
        Converts this theme into its Json equivalent.
        Returns:
        The Json equivalent of this theme.

      • toDynamicString

        String toDynamicString()
        Convert this theme into a pretty json string.
        Returns:
        The converted json string.
